entities.name: ripper
entities.description: Ripper is described as a bulldog that is chasing Harry up a tree.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as laughing below on the lawn while Ripper chases Harry.

entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is telling Harry that he would do well in Slytherin.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is lying in the hospital wing with her face covered with thick black hair.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: A hundred dementors are closing in on Harry beside the dark lake.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is drawing nearer to Harry under the mistletoe.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape has a weal on his wrist like a scorch mark after Harry collided with him.

relationships.description: Ripper is chasing Harry up a tree.
The Dursleys are laughing at Harry while Ripper chases him.
The Sorting Hat is telling Harry that he would do well in Slytherin.
Hermione is lying in the hospital wing.
A hundred dementors are closing in on Harry beside the dark lake.
Cho Chang is drawing nearer to Harry under the mistletoe.
Harry collided with Snape's desk, causing a weal on Snape's wrist.
